name.en: Overview of Commercialization and Regulations in Biomedical Research
name.ch: 生醫研究之商化與法規概述

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 全球新創產業蓬勃發展，促成越來越多的產學合作，縮短了實驗室與產業界的距離；其中，如何使研究成果驗證能夠符合法規及業界期待，是投入生醫產業之最佳捷徑。本課程針對如何將實驗室研究成果轉化為產品為重點，結合實驗室經驗、法規概述、以及業界講師的分享，期許能讓與課同學提早和產業接軌，了解全球生醫產業脈動。(開放大三及大四同學選修)
goal.en: Since the new industry developed vigorously in globe, and it shortened the distance between laboratories to industry and has promoted more opportunities of Industry-Academia cooperation. How to verify the research data corresponded to the regulations and how to adapt to industry expectations are crucial and tough issues for who want to invest in biomedical field. This class focuses on how to transform research data from laboratory into real products, and we expected that students can receive some preliminary information of trends in global biomedical industry. (Deliver in Chinese)

outline.ch:
1. 從實驗室到商品-商化概述
2. ISO 17025實驗室管理需求
3. GLP實驗室介紹/GMP與國內法規
4. 細胞治療與特管法-GTP實施與管理
5. 再生醫療製劑概述/目標產品比較與概述-TPP分析
6. 安全性與有效性評估
7. 淺談醫療器材管理法
8. 期中考
9. 邀請演講
10. 邀請演講
11. 邀請演講
12. 邀請演講
13. 邀請演講
14. 分組報告討論及個別指導
15. 期末分組報告 (I)
16. 期末分組報告 (II)
outline.en:
1. From Lab Process to Product- Overview of Commercialization
2. ISO 17025 Laboratory Management Requirements (I)
3. Overview of GLP Lab/Overview of GMP Lab and Related Domestic Regulations
4. Overview of Cell Therapy and Regulations Governing the Application of Specific Medical Technique and Medical Device (特管法) - GTP Implementation and Management
5. Target Product Profile (TPP)/Overview ofRegenerative Medicinal Products
6. Safety and Effectiveness Evaluation
7. Overview of Medical Device Management Act
8. Mid-term Exam
9. Invited Speech
10. Invited Speech
11. Invited Speech
12. Invited Speech
13. Invited Speech
14. Overall Discussion
15. Group Presentation (I)
16. Group Presentation (II)

textbook.ch:
1. 醫療器材管理法
2. 特定醫療技術檢查檢驗醫療儀器施行或使用管理辦法
3. 再生醫療製劑管理條例草案總說明
4. 財團法人全國認證基金會,“ISO/IEC 17025:2017測試與校正實驗室能力一般要求”(2017)
textbook.en: Shayne C. Gad, “Safety Evaluation of Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices: International Regulatory Guidelines” (2010)"

flexDiscription.ch: 除了第1~16週課程外，另以彈性教學方式規劃第17、18週教學活動。
flexDiscription.en: Flexible teaching activities will be applied on 17th and 18th weeks.
